state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, you could, like, make an effort to go to the west. And then, make an attempt to take a trip west. Then, go to the west. And then, go to the west. After that, take a trip south. And then, attempt to travel south. After that, make an effort to move south. With that over with, attempt to move east. After that, make an attempt to take a trip north. After that, go east. Then, try to take a trip south. Once you do that, go east. Okay, and then, go to the east. Next, pick up the keycard from the floor of the cubicle. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Spare Room =- You are in a spare room. A standard kind of place. Look over there! a workbench. However, the workbench, like an empty workbench, has nothing on it. Hm. Oh well You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a stand! The stand is standard. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Silly stand, silly, empty, good for nothing stand. There is an open hatch leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Spare Room =-0/1
